qa_pairs.question: What are the communication specifications for the RS-232 Serial ASCII bus used by the Axess DCU?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the correct communication protocol and specifications (9600, 8, N, 1) for the RS-232 Serial ASCII bus.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU utilizes an RS-232 Serial ASCII bus with specifications of 9600, 8, N, 1 for communication.

qa_pairs.question: Why is the Axess DCU compatible with electrical resistance (ER), linear polarization resistance (LPR), and galvanic probes?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Checks for understanding of why the Axess DCU is compatible with different probe types due to its design as a corrosion monitoring instrument capable of reading all types of electrical resistance (ER), linear polarization resistance (LPR) and galvanic probes.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU can be used with electrical resistance (ER), linear polarization resistance (LPR), and galvanic probes because it is a high resolution, battery powered, corrosion monitoring instrument capable of reading all types of these probes.

qa_pairs.question: Where can the Axess DCU be mounted, and what is the part number of the kit required for mounting to these locations?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Confirms the mounting options (site structure, Axess low and high pressure access systems) and the requirement of the optional mounting bracket kit (AXDCUBRKT).
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU can be mounted directly to site structure or Axess low and high pressure access systems using an optional mounting bracket kit (AXDCUBRKT).

qa_pairs.question: What are the key functions of the CDAS software used with the Axess DCU?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the functions of the CDAS software: graphing metal loss trends, calculating corrosion rates, and exporting data in csv format.
qa_pairs.answer: The CDAS software is used to graph metal loss trends, calculate corrosion rates, and export data in csv (comma separated value) format for import into excel and other applications.

qa_pairs.question: Where can the Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit) be configured?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: The answer must contain both methods: Axess HHU and DCU LED panel.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess DCU (Data Collection Unit) can be configured with the Axess HHU or on the DCU LED panel.
